attributes.action: Cystic Fibrosis life-changing drugs to be available for all CF patients
attributes.background: We urge Vertex, NICE, the NHS, and relevant decision-makers to reconsidered pulling these drugs from the NHS due to their high cost and ensure these very effective modular drugs remain accessible for all those living with cystic fibrosis who need them

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650674
